scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run ncc
scripts.runLocally: echo act must be installed for this to work && act pull_request -W .github/workflows/example-action.yml --input pmdconfig=tests/pmd-ruleset.xml --input severity-threshold=3 --eventpath tests/example-github-event.json
scripts.release: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'build' && git tag -a -m "build ${npm_config_tag}" "v${npm_config_tag}" && git push --follow-tags
